segments.en: Numbered Discourses 5
25. Bad Conduct
250. Faith in Individuals
“Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of placing faith in an individual.
What five?

segments.pli: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathārūpaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā saṅgho ukkhipati.
segments.en: The individual to whom a person is devoted falls into an offense such that the Saṅgha suspends them.
It occurs to them:

segments.pli: ‘yo kho myāyaṃ puggalo piyo manāpo so saṅghena ukkhitto’ti.
segments.en: ‘This person dear and beloved to me has been suspended by the Saṅgha.’
They lose much of their faith in mendicants.

segments.pli: Bhikkhūsu appasādabahulo samāno aññe bhikkhū na bhajati.
segments.en: So they don’t frequent other mendicants,

segments.pli: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṃ na suṇāti.
segments.en: they don’t hear the true teaching,
and they fall away from the true teaching.
This is the first drawback in placing faith in an individual.

segments.pli: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathārūpaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā saṅgho ante nisīdāpeti.
segments.en: Furthermore, the individual to whom a person is devoted falls into an offense such that the Saṅgha makes them sit at the end of the line. …

segments.pli: ‘yo kho myāyaṃ puggalo piyo manāpo so saṅghena ante nisīdāpito’ti.
Bhikkhūsu appasādabahulo samāno aññe bhikkhū na bhajati.
Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṃ na suṇāti.

segments.en: This is the second drawback in placing faith in an individual.

segments.pli: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so disāpakkanto hoti … pe … so vibbhanto hoti … pe … so kālaṅkato hoti.
segments.en: Furthermore, the individual to whom a person is devoted departs for another region … disrobes … passes away.
It occurs to them:

segments.pli: ‘yo kho myāyaṃ puggalo piyo manāpo so kālaṅkato’ti.
segments.en: ‘This person dear and beloved to me has passed away.’
So they don’t frequent other mendicants,

segments.pli: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṃ na suṇāti.
segments.en: they don’t hear the true teaching,
and they fall away from the true teaching.
This is the fifth drawback in placing faith in an individual.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā puggalappasāde”ti.
segments.en: These are the five drawbacks of placing faith in an individual.”
